list_definition.definition: in sport, a judge or umpire at a boundary line

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The linesman signalled that the ball had crossed the line.

list_ex_of_english: But who would be the accommodating linesman, or the referee?
The linesmen are working under great pressure.

It is true that the blocking of the motorway vitiated early attempts to ship in large numbers of linesmen to reconnect supplies.
I also extend our thanks and congratulations to the emergency services—not least the linesmen who put themselves at particular risk to restore power.
Linesman represents a considerable step forward, and it would be wrong to underestimate it.

Linesman is the air defence project.
